ece.title: Humanoid robot
ece.description: Leading a team in Presidents University (Buildclub), Where our main agenda is to showcase our capability and make this rover as a service rover on ground to help guest for proper navigation around our campus

ece.title: CANSAT India 2023
ece.description: CanSat India which was host by two popular organin on India : INSpace and ISRO at Ahmedabad, Gujarat

ece.title: Robotic prosthetic hand
ece.description: A 3D printed eeg based on raspberry prosthetic hand.

ece.title: Chinnu Robot
ece.description: A 3D printed ai based toy friendly robot which runs on ROS upon the Raspberry Pi with an arduino Nano for locomotion and Applet the concept of cloud robotics Were intens task used to be performed at local host cloud where it used to detect your emotions And try to be friendly with you based on that... ( Basically a talkative robot )

ece.title: Self driving vehicle
ece.description: A final year project of My Collage (Batch: 2020), Where the rover uses LIDAR sensor, raspberry pi, Arduino Nano and drives on power bank

ece.title: Car theft detection
ece.description: Made a project for My Collage Junior Team (Batch: 2021) , (Academics)IPR project for there Semester. Based on Raspberry Pi

ece.title: Voice based home automation
ece.description: Made a project for My Collage Junior Team (Batch: 2021) , (Academics)IPR project for there Semester. Based on Raspberry Pi

ece.title: Smart iot based visitor count (Foot Fall) and lighting control
ece.description: Made a project for My Collage Junior Team (Batch: 2021) , (Academics)IPR project for there Semester. Based on Raspberry Pi

ece.title: Home Decor
ece.description: LED vintage looking bulb with a 3D printed shadow frame hangin a cable at the center of the house to make it look more aesthetic and give a vibe

ece.title: Bluetooth based home automation
ece.description: Custom application with HC05 Blt Module with an arduino so smart control Home Appliances

ece.title: Smart outdoor light
ece.description: Based on the sunlight intensity the light will turn on and off to keep the outdoor garden illuminated based on need

ece.title: 2 Channel Smart home automation (IOT)
ece.description: A smart home automation using ESP8266-01 Integrated with the home assistant (OK Google, ...)

ece.title: Smart outdoor light v2
ece.description: A device which automatically turns on after Sun goes down and after a shutter threshold/time the outer lights also turns off (Because there is no need of illuminating at the night time Once everyone goes to sleep )

ece.title: Innovatix 2.0
ece.description: Competition held at Presidency University at 2023, this are my collection of bots which i made for the competition

ece.title: line follower robot
ece.description: A robot which follows the line and complete the maze the shortest time taken will be the winner.

ece.title: Robo racer
ece.description: Multiple difficult challenge terrains are given whether over should gain maximum point by touching the flags and reach the destination and the rover with the maximum point will be the winner

ece.title: Robo soccer
ece.description: A robot basically to play soccer

ece.title: Pengu Robot
ece.description: A personalised AI Equipped robot, For talking like a smart assistant ( Custom trend on AIML library ), Do home automation has expression also to express the emotions has two axes servo motors to do neck movements...

ece.title: Smart door lock
ece.description: using finger print or else a keypad unlock a door, A project which was meant for my junior students as their academic project IPA (Batch: 2022)

ece.title: Smart Dustbin
ece.description: A raspberry pi based smart dustbin which segregates the waste and separate at three different containers

cse.title: Humanoid main brain
cse.description: Its Jetson Nano which is running Ubuntu with ROS2 to make the entire humanoid alive

cse.title: Mini media player and home automation
cse.description: Runs on raspberry pi 3B+ Where it serves media player as a custom local host ott platform as well as little bit of home automation to control few of the lights from the mobile application

cse.title: Self driving car
cse.description: Made a project for final year student of PU batch (2020) Where the entire vehicle runs on object detection and few LIDAR sensors to scan the environment as a safety precaution with the camera
